      static void downloadJAR(String fileURL, String saveDir, String fileName)

        public static void requestMetafile(String metaFileName)
        Makes a secure call to the downloader-server to obtain the remote metadata object
        Parameters:

      • downloadJAR

        public static void downloadJAR(String fileURL,
                               String saveDir,
                               String fileName)
        Makes a secure request to the server where the requested JAR resides and downloads the JAR
        Parameters:
        fileURL - The URL where the JAR to be downloaded resides
        saveDir - The directory where the downloaded JAR is to be copied
        fileName - The name of the JAR that is to be downloaded
